title: Rob Walker
description: In this audio interview with Debbie Millman, Rob Walker discusses how our digital records remain online even after we die, and his desire to brand the idea of being “happy for what you have”.
itunes:subtitle: In this audio interview with Debbie Millman, Rob Walker discusses how our digital records remain online even after we die, and his desire to brand  the idea of being “happy for what you have”.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
